name: lockedin-extension
description: Simple website blocker to improve focus and productivity

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/src && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp -r src/* dist/src/ && node -e "const m=require('./dist/manifest.json');const p=require('./package.json');m.version=p.version;require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/manifest.json',JSON.stringify(m,null,'	')+'\n')"
scripts.release: npm run build && rm -f ext.zip && cd dist && zip -r ../ext.zip .
